# define PI 3.14159265

int main() {
    int t,cap,men,women,child,rmen,rwomen,rchild;
    
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--) {
            scanf("%d %d %d %d",&cap,&men,&women,&child);
            
            rmen=1;
            men--;
            cap--;
            rwomen=0;
            rchild=0;
            
            while(cap) {
                    
                    if( rchild<(rmen+rwomen)*4 && child)
                                {
                                    cap--;
                                    child--;
                                    rchild++;
                                }
                    
                    else if( rwomen<rmen*2 && women) 
                                {
                                     cap--;
                                     women--;
                                     rwomen++;
                                }
                   
                    else if(men) 
                                {
                                     cap--;
                                     men--;
                                     rmen++;
                                }
                   else break;             
            }
            printf("%d %d %d\n",rmen,rwomen,rchild);
    }
    return 0;
}
